title: Downing Street party: No 10 staff joked about party amid lockdown restrictions
content:
1. Downing Street party: No 10 staff joked about party amid lockdown restrictions  BBC News
  2. PM accused of lying after No 10 officials caught joking about Christmas party  The Guardian
  3. Cheese and wine? UK PM's staff joked about alleged lockdown party  Reuters UK
  4. Johnson urged to ‘come clean’ after aides filmed joking about ‘Christmas party’  The Independent
  5. Downing Street ‘Christmas party’ is not about hypocrisy. It’s about criminality  The Independent

localize.title: ダウニング街のパーティー。No.10のスタッフがロックダウン規制の中、パーティーについて冗談を言っていました。
唐宁街的聚会。十号院的工作人员在封锁限制中对派对开玩笑
唐寧街的聚會。十號院的工作人員在封鎖限制中對派對開玩笑
